Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Chop carrots, celery, shiitake mushrooms, and green onions.
Combine soy sauce, mirin, and rice vinegar in a small bowl.
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Heat a large pot over medium heat. Add tofu and cook until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add carrots, celery, and shiitake mushrooms. Cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, add noodles and cooked tofu. Simmer for 5 minutes.
